thread.title: Evan Jones
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Evan Jones

author: Evan Jones
title: Evan Jones
text: JR pass works particularly well when you have travel conducted over consecutive days, but somewhat less so if your travel consists of sporadic bursts with periods spent at destinations. However if you think creatively it can work mixed in with periods of full fare pay. Just do your sums. Using a website such as hyperdia can help fill the gaps.
